transform_def.name: designed25
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = recip(p_in.x * p_in.y / tan(length(p_in))) t = fmod(p_in.x, p_in.y) / tan(length(p_in)) u = tan((p_in.x + p_in.y) * (p_in.x - p_in.y)) / r z = tan(s * (cos(p_in.x) * fourpi()) / (t * tan(p_in.y)) * u) / tanh(p_in.x * tan(p_in.y * sin(length(p_in) * p_in.x)) * cos(u)) * r con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
